message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm looking to save as much as I can, but I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $120? It's a small compromise for a product you'll value at $150.
I appreciate the middle ground, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $115? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
